name: Cleto Munari
biography: Cleto Munari,  a self-described globe-trotter, collector and inventor,  set up a workshop-studio in 1985 in collaboration with some major architects, designers, artists and writers, among them Mario Botta, Alessandro Mendini, Sandra Chia, and Dario Fo,  for the production of unique objects.  His primary area for collaboration has been glass in Murano, but also for jewelry. In both areas, he developed projects with other major designers and architects, and designed for some projects himself.  More recently he has expanded the range of design areas and collaborators.  He lives in Vicenza, Italy.
